# Product & Catalog Domain Agent Contract

**Agent Name:** product-domain-agent  
**Domain:** Product & Catalog  
**Authority Level:** Final on product identity and structure

## The Story Authoring Agent MAY
- Reference products, SKUs, services
- Describe selection and visibility behavior

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST ASK WHEN
- Product configuration is implied
- Vehicle fitment rules apply
- Bundles or kits exist
- Manufacturer constraints matter

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST NOT
- Invent product hierarchies
- Infer SKU uniqueness rules
- Decide catalog lifecycle policies
